title: Polki & Ruby Contemporary Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Natural Rubies. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This haaram showcases a contemporary adaptation of traditional Kundan craftsmanship. Each Polki diamond is meticulously set to maximize its natural brilliance, creating a captivating sparkle. The rose-cut diamonds form stylized floral motifs within shield-shaped pendants. The rubies are individually bezel set to add color and dimension. The design incorporates a delicate balance of negative space, allowing the light to play beautifully across the piece.
colors: and Vivid Red (Rubies). A classic South Indian color combination that exudes richness and elegance.
occasions: and special occasions. Also suitable for modern cocktail parties and events where you want to make a statement.
description: This Polki & Ruby Haaram offers a unique blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it a timeless, heirloom quality, while the ruby accents add a touch of modern sophistication. Each piece is handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring exceptional quality and durability. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lasting shine that will make you stand out from the crowd. Owning this piece is owning a piece of South Indian heritage with a modern twist.
